Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay medium pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 102, 16? Petrie drew a full rho as the second letter in line 2, though the loop is porly preserved. In some lights the second letter of line 1 can appear to be an alpha, but there is no cross-bar.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0495)
